page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RACHEL
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7.30.Wash,dress and have my breakfast of toast and fruit juice.At 8.20 I go to school with my friend from next door.School opens at 8.55 but I go in early to help in the hall for Assembly.The rest of the morning is Maths,English and any corrections from previous work.At 12 o'clock I go home for lunch, returning early to play Tiddly_Igo with my friends.There are two teams,one runs away,the other has to catch them.When caught you change round.School starts at 1.25 it is Art and then the teacher reads more of our story before 3.45. Playtimes are Resource monitor duties. After school I usually play with my friends at home.
